name: Untitled English Game
description:
This is Untitled English Game

Inspired by Danganronpa's Hangman's Gambit! You need to fill in the blanks by shooting the correct words and punctuation.

Controls are:

LMB to shoot

Mouse to move

Esc to pause

Enter to end the game on the end screen

Programming: Callum Carthy 

Music/Sound - Harry Gillett

3D Modelling/Art/Original Game Idea - Rosie Carter
